## Experimental.RangeOf.propertiesToString() method

Gets a formatted description of a [RangeOfProperties&lt;T&gt;](./ts-extras.experimental.rangeofproperties.md) given an optional set of formats and 'empty' value to use.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static propertiesToString<T>(range: RangeOfProperties<T>, formats?: RangeOfFormats, emptyValue?: T): string | undefined;
```

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

</td><td>

T


</td><td>

string \| undefined

A string representation of the range.
